JUDGES: Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . She is represented before the Court by Mr M. Linić , a lawyer practising in PERSON .
On DATE the applicant gave birth to her third child .

In a decision of ORG , ORG ( LOC zdravstveno osiguranje , Područni ured PERSON – “ ORG ” ) of DATE , the applicant 's right to maternity leave and maternity allowance was established for the period from DATE to DATE , as provided by section CARDINAL of LAW .

On DATE ORG amended LAW and LAW so as to establish the right to maternity leave and maternity allowance until the child 's first birthday . The right to an additional period of maternity leave and allowance for a third child was withdrawn .

Accordingly , by its decision of DATE ORG withdrew the applicant 's right to maternity leave and maternity allowance , as of DATE . This decision was upheld on DATE by ORG , ORG in GPE ( Hrvatski zavod za zdravstveno osiguranje GPE , GPE ) and by ORG Upravni sud Repbulike Hrvatske ) on DATE .
The applicant 's subsequent constitutional complaint was dismissed on DATE by ORG ( Ustavni sud PERSON ) as ill - founded .
The relevant part of LAW ( Zakon o radu , Official Gazette CARDINAL ) , as in force until DATE , read :
( CARDINAL ) for twins as well as for the third and every further child , a woman in employment has the right to maternity leave until DATE .
The relevant part of LAW ( Zakon o izmjenama i dopunama PERSON , ORG of DATE ) reads :
“ Section CARDINAL paragraph CARDINAL of LAW ... is amended as follows :
' for twins , triplets , quadruplets or more children of the same age , a woman in employment has the right to maternity leave until the child 's DATE . '
The relevant part of ORG o zdravstvenom osiguranju , ORG no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) , as in force until DATE , read :
“ An insured person has the right to payment of salary in connection with health insurance
( CARDINAL ) when he or she is temporarily incapacitated for work on account of maternity leave until the child 's first or DATE ...
The relevant part of LAW ( Zakon o izmjenama i dopunama PERSON o zdravstvenom osiguranju , ORG no CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) reads :
“ LAW paragraph CARDINAL(CARDINAL ) of ORG ... is amended as follows :
' a person temporarily incapacitated for work on account of maternity leave until the child 's first year ... '
